parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.05

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if the given AI feature is currently enabled. Feature may be one of:
* <tt>"AwareFormationSoft"</tt>
* <tt>"CombatFormationSoft"</tt>
* [[disableAI]]/[[enableAI]] AI skill <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.95.145843</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''checkAIFeature''' feature

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> feature: [[String]] (see description)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if is enabled

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> unit '''checkAIFeature''' feature <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.95.145843</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - unit to test AI feature for

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> feature: [[String]] - [[disableAI]] / [[enableAI]] feature

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value>[[Boolean]] - [[true]] if is enabled

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_featureUsed = [[checkAIFeature]] "AwareFormationSoft";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> <code>_autotargetOn = bob [[checkAIFeature]] "AUTOTARGET";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableAIFeature]], [[enableAI]], [[disableAI]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
